items.sentence: Tom said he thought we might have a problem.
You can\'t drive now. You\'ve been drinking.
It\'s not as cold today as it was yesterday.
Try to answer as many questions as possible.
Try to estimate how much you spent on books.
Was Tom the one who taught you how to dance?
Was it raining this morning when you got up?
What Tom likes most is whiskey on the rocks.
What are you doing at school this afternoon?
What brand of dog food do you feed your dog?
What do you think I should pack for my trip?
Tom said jokingly that he was not very rich.
Tom said something funny and we all laughed.
I wouldn\'t tell Tom anything if I were you.
I\'d like to buy two 45-cent stamps, please.
I\'d like to send this package to Australia.
I\'d like to take a small trip this weekend.
Why do you put so much sugar in your coffee?
Tom said he didn\'t know how to play tennis.
I have the money that you\'re talking about.
